# Load the data and analyze

```{r setup}
library(generalconference)
library(dplyr)
data("genconf")
head(genconf)
```

```{r}
df <- genconf
```

How many conferences have there been since 1971?
```{r}
df %>%
  count()
```

How many sessions have there been?
```{r}
df %>%
  unnest(sessions) %>%
  count()
```

How many talks have there been since 1971?
```{r}
df %>%
  unnest(sessions) %>%
  unnest(talks) %>%
  count()
```
